message: Display all tweets that contain the words "how to", use auto tagging service like Calais to organize and filter
If I'm gonna keep it, it has to earn it's keep!

So I have been clearing out some old domains, sites and blogs that I had sitting around. Most of which I sold as aged domains on Flippa but this one, http://Twitter-HowTo.com I thought I might actually put some time into and do something with.

@jthomasbailey (Slightly of topic) I found Dan Grossman's Calais WP plugin but it requires you to hit a tag suggestion button from the WP post page, do you know if anybody has built a completely automated tag WP plugin?
Not for Wordpress but the Drupal module is automated
